title: Buying: Ed Walsh, Bill Dahlen, George Davis, Hugh Duffy

posts.post_title: Buying: Ed Walsh, Bill Dahlen, George Davis, Hugh Duffy
posts.post_content:
Please bring everything you have available for sale of the players listed in the title. I have $$ to buy nice items so if you are looking to sell please contact me here via private message, or through email at [url]seth.yarkony@gmail.com[/url].

Thank you!
